title: Axis of Justice - Concert Series Volume 1
description:
Axis of Justice is a non-profit organization co-founded by Serj Tankian (of System of a Down) and Tom Morello (Rage Against the Machine, Audioslave, The Nightwatchman). Its purpose is to bring together musicians, fans of music, and grassroots political organizations to fight for social justice together.

This is a concert given by Serj Tankian (vocals, piano) and Tom Morello (guitars, vocals) as members of Axis of Justice with the performances of:

    * Flea ? bass
    * Brad Wilk ? drums
    * Pete Yorn ? guitars, vocals
    * Tim Walker ? guitars, pedal steel
    * Maynard James Keenan ? vocals
    * Jonny Polonsky ? keyboards, bass
    * Chris Cornell ? vocals
    * Slash - guitar
    * Simon Petty ? guitars
    * Malcolm Cross ? drums, percussion, piano
    * Travis Barker - drums
    * Sid Jordan ? bass, piano
    * Joe Mora ? guitars
    * Wayne Kramer ? guitars, vocal
    * John Dolmayan ? drums
    * Jurassic 5 ? vocals
    * Knowledge ? spoken word
    * Brian O&#039;Connor ? bass
    * Ahmed Ahmed ? comedian
    * Boots Riley (The Coup) ? vocals

The concert was a benefit to raise money for the Axis of Justice and a variety of causes.
